DOC.brief_summary: BACKGROUND : Major depression become second important cause disability 2020 . Computerised cognitive-behaviour therapy could efficacious cost-effective option treatment . No study cost-effectiveness low intensity v self-guided psychotherapy carry . AIM : To assess efficacy low intensity v self-guided psychotherapy major depression Spanish health system . METHODS : The study make 3 phase : 1.- Development computerise cognitive-behaviour therapy depression tailor Spanish health system . 2.- Multicenter control , randomize study : A sample ( N=450 patient ) mild/moderate depression recruit primary care . They internet availability home , receive previous psychological treatment , suffer severe somatic psychological disorder . They allocate one 3 treatment : ) Low intensity Internet-delivered psychotherapy + improve treatment usual ( ITAU ) GP , b ) Self-guided Internet-delivered psychotherapy + ITAU c ) ITAU . Patients diagnose MINI psychiatric interview . Main outcome variable Beck Depression Inventory . It also administer EuroQol 5D ( quality life ) Client Service Receipt Inventory ( consume health social service ) . Patients assessed baseline , 3 12 month . An intention treat per protocol analysis perform .
DOC.brief_title: Low Intensity Versus Self-guided Internet-delivered Psychotherapy Major Depression
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis major depression . It carry MINI International Neuropsychiatric Interview + score moderate mild depression use Beck Depression Inventory II . Cutoff point questionnaire : 013 : minimal depression ; 1419 : mild depression ; 2028 : moderate depression ; 2963 : severe depression [ 34 , 35 ] . Aged 1865 year Able understand read Spanish Moderate mild major depression Duration symptom longer 2 week Access Internet home email address . Any psychological treatment last year Severe psychiatric disorder Axis I ( alcohol/substances abuse dependence , psychotic disorder dementia ) patient severe depression ( indicated BeckII score 29 high ) advise consult GP Receiving pharmacological treatment antidepressant exclusion criterion meanwhile , study period , treatment modify increase ( decrease pharmacological treatment accept ) .
